function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Utilizing UVGI technology without proper precautions for human exposure to UV radiation","Impact":"Harm to building inhabitants from UV radiation exposure","Mitigation":"Ensuring that surrounding areas are not exposed to UV radiation when using a mobile UVGI device","Technologies":"UVGI technology, G4 filter","People":"Building inhabitants","Owner":"Facility management or building operators"},{"Description":"Potential reliance on a single bio sensor for virus detection","Impact":"Limited detection capability or false negatives for virus presence","Mitigation":"Implementing additional virus detection methods for comprehensive coverage","Technologies":"Soterius Scout bio sensor","People":"Building inhabitants, facility management","Owner":"Building operators, facility management"},{"Description":"Implementation of plastic barriers without proper maintenance and monitoring","Impact":"Ineffective disease transmission reduction and potential air quality issues","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of barrier system components including HEPA filter and aerosol generator","Technologies":"Plastic barriers, HEPA filter, aerosol generator","People":"Building inhabitants, facility management","Owner":"Building operators, facility management"}]}
